# Overview

Explore Multi-Index Sampled data

https://www.tidymodels.org/start/tuning/


# Packages

```{r}
# Load necessary packages
library(tidyverse)
```


# Load list of csv files

```{r}
core_list = list.files(path="../data/MultiIndexSample/CORE", pattern='*.csv', full.names = TRUE)
#fisl_fwi_list
```

# Read and Combine

```{r}
csv_rbind <- function(file_list) {
  csv_data <- purrr::map_dfr(file_list, read_csv)
  return(csv_data)
}

```

```{r}
(core = csv_rbind(core_list))
```
